title: Reflective learning community-based PBL course for novice instructional designers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Instructional Design Concepts and Fundamental Knowledge in Science
context.additional_context: An instructional design project in science for learners composed of current practitioners, strengthening reflective practice and collaborative learning experiences

learning_goals: Learners will critically analyze and improve their instructional design process through reflective journaling.
Learners will revise one instructional design prototype based on peer feedback in a PBL environment.
Learners will derive at least three strategies by applying learner-centered approaches when designing science instruction.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
